content: **errigal cable poncho ** ======================================= stunning cables and a delicate moss stitch make this crochet poncho pattern perfect for any season effortlessly modern and a delight in a tweed yarn the construction is far simpler than you might think **poncho sizing & fit** the pattern is written for 4 sizes xs/s m/l xl/2x and 3x/4x and is designed for a relaxed oversized fit a simple rectangle forms the basis for this poncho so it is very easy to adjust for a different size too **to fit bust** xs/s 28 34″ / 81 86cm m/l 36 42″ / 101 5 106 5cm xl/2x 44 50″ / 122 127cm 3x/4x 52 58″ / 142 147cm **yardage** xs/s 1798 yds / 1644m m/l 2047 yds / 1872m xl/2x 2175 yds / 1988m 3x/4x 2327 yds / 2128m --- **join my newsletter ** ======================================== subscribe to my newsletter 1 to be kept in the loop about pattern releases freebies sales and much more --- © ned & mimi 2021 you are free to use this pattern to create finished products for sale in fact i would be honoured if selling finished products from this pattern online i do ask that you give credit for the pattern to ned & mimi and link back to http //www nedandmimi com *due to the nature of the pdf files sales i cannot refund any patterns as it is not possible to return the purchase however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns * *the photographs and pattern contained in this pattern are the property of ned & mimi © this pattern is for personal use only no unauthorized reproduction in whole or in part or distribution of this pattern or content is permitted * 1 https //nedandmimi com/subscribe
